WorkItem.Description:
I am used to the JC Gem warnings, but now this issue seems to be carrying over to gear that I change since Battle.net character loads.
 
Steps to reproduce:
File - Load from Battle.net - <insert toon name etc.>
 
Toon is shown with gear - Change 1 or more gear Pieces to a different piece of gear
 
Tools - Optimizer...
 
Select: Calculation to Optimze: Burst DPS Rating - Check Override Reenchant - Slide Thoroughness to maximum - CTRL click Optimize
 
And I am given the error: 
 
The following currently equipped items are not available
 
Stormrider's Shoulderweraps is not available
OBsidian Arborweave Vestment is not available
Firescar Sash is not available
 
Do you want to continue with the optimization?"
 
Note: The gear names are simply the most recent attempt I have made to try and optimize my gear.  Usually I can just put the gear on in game and Load from Battle.net but today the armory is being a pain to update so I am trying, yet again, to just make the gear swaps in RAWR with no success once I get to the optimization process.
WorkItem.Summary: Optimizer Warning - Gear Pieces Not Available

Comments.Message:
This is by design. Optimizer requires you to mark gear as available to be considered in optimization. If you have something equipped but not marked available you get the above warning. All you have to do is click on the diamond next to the items in question.

Now that I think about it, it would be very useful to add a third button that marks the items for you automatically and continues with optimization. I'll see about adding that.

Ah okay, I hadn't realized that added functionality to the side panel, there.  Suddenly RAWR has a lot more to offer!  (not that it didn't already have enough haha).

Thanks for the quick response, Kavan!
